quotes.name: BQ
quotes.author: gradis
quotes.content:
**Base Quality is based on:**```yml
- Hero Highest level across all 12 vocations.
- Hero Highest revocation number across all 12 vocations
- The level of the last grotto beaten.```**Quality Ranges Between: 2 - 248
Example BQ Calculation:**
```yml
Hero Highest Level: 99
Hero Highest Revocation: +10
(Each Revocation Adds 5 Quality, So 10*5 = 50)
Level of Last Grotto Beaten: 99
99 + 50 + 99 = 248```

quotes.name: Spreadsheet
quotes.author: gradis
quotes.content: You can find this information in my DQIX spreadsheet, listed [here](<https://discord.com/channels/655390550698098700/1197762578085064704/1197762592559616061>) in the server.

quotes.name: OldSchool
quotes.author: gradis
quotes.content:
A lot of information within the [DQIX Resources forum channels](<https://discord.com/channels/655390550698098700/1143509536783736965>) are made cleaner than it used to be, however I know it's easier to link the regular archived channels still.
If you'd prefer having access to these old channels, type `?rank OldSchool` in [#Bot Commands Channel](<https://discord.com/channels/655390550698098700/692867688325709835>)
